languages.text: По итогам расследования дела о рекрутинге преступников было решено узаконить их найм, введя особый тюремный режим на флагмане. Отныне они трудятся в два раза усерднее под надзором блюстителей.

traits.locale_text: По итогам расследования дела о рекрутинге преступников было решено узаконить их найм, введя особый тюремный режим на флагмане. Отныне они трудятся в два раза усерднее под надзором блюстителей.

languages.text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.
languages.original_text: По итогам расследования дела о рекрутинге преступников было решено узаконить их найм, введя особый тюремный режим на флагмане. Отныне они трудятся в два раза усерднее под надзором блюстителей.

traits.locale_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

languages.text: Nach der Untersuchung zur Rekrutierung von Verbrechern wurde beschlossen, diese Praxis zu legitimieren und einen speziellen Strafvollzug auf dem Flaggschiff zu installieren. Von nun an werden sie unter dem wachsamen Blick der Enforcers doppelt so hart arbeiten.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Nach der Untersuchung zur Rekrutierung von Verbrechern wurde beschlossen, diese Praxis zu legitimieren und einen speziellen Strafvollzug auf dem Flaggschiff zu installieren. Von nun an werden sie unter dem wachsamen Blick der Enforcers doppelt so hart arbeiten.

languages.text: Suite à une enquête, il a été décidé de légitimer le recrutement des hors-la-loi en introduisant un régime pénitentiaire sur le navire amiral. Désormais, ils redoubleront d'efforts sous la surveillance des prévôts.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Suite à une enquête, il a été décidé de légitimer le recrutement des hors-la-loi en introduisant un régime pénitentiaire sur le navire amiral. Désormais, ils redoubleront d'efforts sous la surveillance des prévôts.

languages.text: 行商浪人对招募罪犯的做法进行调查之后，决定在旗舰上设立特别监狱制度，将这种做法全面合法化。从现在开始，招募来的罪犯会在执法者的监视下加倍努力地工作。
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: 行商浪人对招募罪犯的做法进行调查之后，决定在旗舰上设立特别监狱制度，将这种做法全面合法化。从现在开始，招募来的罪犯会在执法者的监视下加倍努力地工作。

languages.text: Tras la investigación sobre el reclutamiento de delincuentes, se tomó la decisión de legitimar esta práctica mediante un régimen especial de prisión en la nave insignia. A partir de ahora, trabajarán el doble de duro bajo la mirada vigilante de los guardias.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Tras la investigación sobre el reclutamiento de delincuentes, se tomó la decisión de legitimar esta práctica mediante un régimen especial de prisión en la nave insignia. A partir de ahora, trabajarán el doble de duro bajo la mirada vigilante de los guardias.

languages.text: 犯罪者の採用に関する調査の結果、旗艦内に特別な刑務制度を導入することで、その行為を正当化する決定が下された。今後、彼らは執行官の厳しい監視のもと、これまでの倍の労働に従事することになる。
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: 犯罪者の採用に関する調査の結果、旗艦内に特別な刑務制度を導入することで、その行為を正当化する決定が下された。今後、彼らは執行官の厳しい監視のもと、これまでの倍の労働に従事することになる。

languages.text: Suçluların işe alınmasına ilişkin soruşturmanın ardından sancak gemisine özel bir hapishane rejimi getirilerek bu uygulamanın yasallaştırılmasına karar verildi. Bu kişiler artık infaz görevlilerinin gözetiminde ve iki kat daha fazla çalışacaklar.
languages.original_text: Following the investigation into the recruitment of criminals, the decision was made to legitimise the practice by instating a special prison regime on the flagship. From now on, they will toil twice as hard under the watchful eye of the enforcers.

traits.locale_text: Suçluların işe alınmasına ilişkin soruşturmanın ardından sancak gemisine özel bir hapishane rejimi getirilerek bu uygulamanın yasallaştırılmasına karar verildi. Bu kişiler artık infaz görevlilerinin gözetiminde ve iki kat daha fazla çalışacaklar.
